pull_request.title: FIPS202: externalize and copy from mupq
pull_request.body:
This removes the fips202.c implementation shipped in the MLKEM reference implementation and instead takes the one from mupq available at https://github.com/mupq/mupq/tree/master/common.
It is stripped down to only the functions that MLKEM requires. This will make it easier to plug in code optimized for specific CPUs later.

Need to clarify how to properly mark the licenses (see #5)

pull_request.title: FIPS202: externalize and copy from mupq
pull_request.body:
This removes the fips202.c implementation shipped in the MLKEM reference implementation and instead takes the one from mupq available at https://github.com/mupq/mupq/tree/master/common.
It is stripped down to only the functions that MLKEM requires. This will make it easier to plug in code optimized for specific CPUs later.

Need to clarify how to properly mark the licenses (see #5)
